long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin makes search and translation very easy for developers. You can search with stack overflow or listed search engines as you wish. 
This plugin makes your new tab functional.
If you are a developer, this plugin will really save your life!
